scripts.build: npm run biome && tsc --noEmit && vite build && rm -rf dist && vite build --mode client && cp -r static dist
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy --branch=preview
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy --branch=main
scripts.db:generate:
drizzle-kit generate && echo '
Remember to update reset.sql script in case you have created any new table!
'
scripts.db:migrate:preview: wrangler d1 migrations apply --env preview cloudfire-preview-db --remote
scripts.db:studio:preview: cross-env $(grep -v '^#' .dev.vars | xargs) $(grep -m 2 "^database_id=" wrangler.toml | tail -n1) drizzle-kit studio
scripts.db:reset:local: wrangler d1 execute cloudfire-prod-db --local --file=./src/server/lib/db/reset.sql && npm run db:migrate:local
scripts.db:reset:preview: wrangler d1 execute --env preview cloudfire-preview-db --remote --file=./src/server/lib/db/reset.sql && npm run db:migrate:preview
scripts.db:reset:prod: wrangler d1 execute cloudfire-prod-db --remote --file=./src/server/lib/db/reset.sql && npm run db:migrate:prod
scripts.release: branch=$(git branch --show-current); if [[ $branch == 'master' || $branch == 'main' ]]; then commit-and-tag-version; else echo 'Releases allowed from main branch only'; exit 1; fi;
